content: I've been tracking the food I eat, the time I eat, and my symptoms, which include bloating and gassiness. I've noticed that dairy products seem to make my symptoms worse. I've been tracking this for about a month now. And, yeah, about my cough, Dr. Smith diagnosed me with bronchitis and prescribed antibiotics, which I finished on February 20th, but the cough persisted, so I had to go back to her office on March 1st for a follow-up.
